text: Darryl Amrabat (; born 21 August 1996) is a Moroccan professional footballer who plays as a midfielder for Serie A Italian club Fiorentina, and the Morocco national team. Born in the Netherlands, Amrabat holds Moroccan citizenship. He represented the Netherlands internationally at youth level in 2010, before switching allegiance to Morocco's youth national team in 2013, representing them at senior level from 2017. ==Club career== Starting his senior career at Utrecht in 2014, Amrabat moved to Feyenoord in 2017. After one season, he joined Club Brugge, before being sent on loan to Italy at Hellas Verona in 2019. On 31 January 2020, Hellas Verona exercised their option to purchase his rights from Club Brugge and immediately re-sold them to Fiorentina. In return, Fiorentina loaned him back to Verona until the end of the 2019–20 season. ==International career== ===Netherlands youth team=== Amrabat was born in the Netherlands to parents of Moroccan descent. He first represented the Netherlands U15 team. ===Morocco=== Amrabat later represented the Morocco national under-17 football team at the 2013 FIFA U-17 World Cup. He made his senior debut for the Morocco national team in a 1–0 friendly win over Tunisia. In May 2018, he was named in Morocco’s 23-man squad for the 2018 FIFA World Cup in Russia. ==Personal life== He is the younger brother of fellow Morocco international player Nordin Amrabat. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center" |- !rowspan=2|Club !rowspan=2|Season !colspan=3|League !colspan=2|Cup !colspan=2|Other !colspan=2|Total |- !Division!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- |rowspan=4|Utrecht |2014–15 |Eredivisie |4||0||0||0||0||0||4||0 |- |2015–16 |Eredivisie |7||0||1||0||4Appearances in the Eredivisie Europa League Play- Offs||0||12||0 |- |2016–17 |Eredivisie |31||0||4||0||3||1||38||1 |- !colspan=2|Total !42!!0!!5!!0!!7!!1!!54!!1 |- |Feyenoord |2017–18 |Eredivisie |21||1||3||0||71 appearance in the Johan Cruyff Shield and 6 appearances in the Champions League||1||31||2 |- !colspan=3|Career total !63!!1!!8!!0!!14!!2!!85!!3 |} ===International=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- !National team!!Year!!Apps!!Goals |- |rowspan="4"|Morocco |2017||2||0 |- |2018||6||0 |- |2019||6||0 |- !Total||14||0 |} ==Honours== Feyenoord *KNVB Cup: 2017–18Feyenoord wint KNVB- beker mede dankzij prachtgoal Van Persie -
